LanguageData.BM_SpacerDoomsdayRocketLauncherCombatMod: A high-tech combat-oriented device that can be installed into any compatible artificial arm replacement. This particular model includes a compact storage and deployment apparatus for doomsday rocket launchers. After firing, what remains of the launcher is safely ejected and a replacement one can be loaded. Due to its small size and low weight, the wielder can carry it around comfortably with no interference during daily tasks.
